## PlatformEx.isMacOS property

We're on a macOS device, or a device that pretends to be one (like iPhones and iPads). Typically used to detect whether to use command-based hotkeys vs ctrl-based hotkeys.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isMacOS: boolean;
```
